job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Title: Data ScientistWhy is this position open? GrowthPay/Salary/Benefits/Perks: $120k/yr - $140k/yrWork from Home Policy: Full RemoteSkills Required: We're looking for highly skilled data scientist to bring your breadth of knowledge to our team. As part of our team, you'll work with other passionate data scientists in an exciting, dynamic environment working with a massive dataset utilizing machine learning and more.Best Personality Match for this Role: Someone knowledgeable with Data Science, Machine learning, and moreScreening / Background checks Required: CriminalRequired:- A few years of strong technical experience around data science and machine learning- Heavy with SQL and Python- Expert knowledge around machine learning, applied statistics, and A/B testing- Code optimization, deployment, and monitoring ML models- Strong collaboratorNice-to-have:- Master's or Ph.D. degree- Experience with two-sided marketplace- Experience with AWS (DynamoDB, SageMaker) or equivalent- Experience with Airflow- Experience with a deep learning frameworkDesired Skills and ExperienceWe're looking for highly skilled data scientist to bring your breadth of knowledge to our team. As part of our team, you'll work with other passionate data scientists in an exciting, dynamic environment working with a massive dataset utilizing machine learning and more.
